# The `ModuloSchedule` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Represents a schedule for a single-block loop.

For every instruction we maintain a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> and Stage.

Definition at line 80 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/moduloschedule-h">ModuloSchedule.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### ModuloSchedule() {#abc00f8fd26b8e579acd8ab1a84467731}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::ModuloSchedule::ModuloSchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42; Loop, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; ScheduledInstrs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, int &gt; Cycle, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, int &gt; Stage)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduloschedule">ModuloSchedule</a>.

<ul>
<li>ScheduledInstrs The new loop instructions, in total resequenced order.</li>
<li><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> index for all instructions in ScheduledInstrs. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> does not need to start at zero. ScheduledInstrs must be partially ordered by <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a>.</li>
<li>Stage Stage index for all instructions in ScheduleInstrs.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/moduloschedule-h/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/moduloschedule-h">ModuloSchedule.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### ScheduledInstrs {#a1bb040c41d1d5e973a14e72be39067bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt; llvm::ModuloSchedule::ScheduledInstrs</>}>
The instructions to be generated, in total order.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> provides a partial order; the total order within cycles has been decided by the schedule producer.
